mapper.insert: SELECT ISEQ$$_80121.currval from dual insert into mus_cloth(clothName, sellerId, publeYear, cateCode, clothPrice, clothStock, clothDiscount, clothIntro, clothContents) values(#{clothName},#{sellerId}, #{publeYear},#{cateCode},#{clothPrice},#{clothStock},#{clothDiscount},#{clothIntro},#{clothContents})
mapper.select: select * from mus_cate order by catecode
select count(*) from mus_cloth where clothName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select clothId, clothName, (select brandName from mus_seller where sellerId = mus_cloth.sellerId) brandName, sellerId, publeYear, cateCode, clothPrice, clothStock, clothDiscount, clothIntro, clothContents, regDate, updateDate from mus_cloth where clothId = #{clothId}
mapper.update: update mus_cloth set clothName = #{clothName}, sellerId = #{sellerId}, publeYear = #{publeYear}, cateCode = ${cateCode}, clothPrice = #{clothPrice}, clothStock = #{clothStock}, clothDiscount = #{clothDiscount}, clothIntro = #{clothIntro}, clothContents = #{clothContents}, updateDate = sysdate where clothId = ${clothId}
mapper.insert: insert into vam_image(clothId, fileName, uploadPath, uuid) values (#{clothId}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{uuid})
mapper.select: select * from vam_image where uploadpath = to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy\mm\dd')

select * from( select /*+INDEX_DESC(MUS_MEMBER SYS_C007551)*/ rownum as rn, memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberMail, memberPhone, memberAddr1, memberAddr2, memberAddr3, adminCk, regDate, money, point from MUS_MEMBER where memberName like '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from MUS_MEMBER where memberName like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
